
## Add your scores here

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores <- 
  tibble::tribble(
~Name,       ~LSU, ~CLE,
"Freels",     00,   00,
"Chale",     sample(1:6,1,replace=T),   -4001823,
"Wilson",     21,   18,
"Hufstetler", 42,   -Inf,
"Leiby",      06,   14,
"Mayo",       07,   30, 
"Spangler",   00,   00,
"Walton",     21,   03,
"Williams",   42,   45
)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores$diff <- abs(scores$LSU - params$LSU) + abs(scores$CLE - params$CLE)

scores$rank <- rank(scores$diff)
scores[order(scores$rank),]
```
